page.title: 05SPORT
page.content: Sport plays a major part in our community.Perhaps the most popular is {Football},there being a local team Lanark United which has its its own grounds.{Rugby }is well supported and there are usually three {Rugby} teams in operation.Cricket is also popular but not to the same degree.{Golf }has been played at Lanark since 1851 and the Lanark golf course is highly regarded in golfing circles.For young people {Swimming }is well supported and there is keen competition to get into the teams run by the Lanark swimming club.The tennis club in Lanark has a sizeable following as well as the squash club which has its own courts.Sport is encouraged amongst young people by the Y.M.C.A.,which often has a waiting list of eager youngsters willing to join.
